item.description:
• 5:30 to 8:00 p.m.
  • Refreshments: cheese/fruit/crackers and vegetable crudite with herb dip will be served--drinks and sandwiches can be purchased at Coolidge Park Bar and Cafe
  • Parking: ample parking behind the Hotel Northampton
  • For More information: www.hidden-tech.net


background info:
Join your fellow Hidden-Techies (and board members) to kick off another year of Hidden-Tech with a social at the scenic Coolidge Park Cafe bar at the Hotel Northampton. By special arrangement, Jason Whittet, Deputy Director of the Massachusetts Broadband Institute (www.massbroadband.org), along with colleagues, will be at this Hidden-Tech social to meet Hidden-Tech members and learn more from us about Western Mass broadband needs and issues.

This is a premier Northampton location with easy parking. We are considering doing a social here each quarter if the interest is there, so come make your presence felt, hobnob with your colleagues, make new Hidden Tech friends, and share in the spring season with us. We hope to see you there!

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Hidden Tech Fall Social
